children.subject: Yes, I'm available today! It's just me as the other advisors are handing out grad gifts. Drop in closes at 12PM, but I'll be back at 2PM. https://eecs.berkeley.edu/resources/undergrads/cs/advising#staff_advisors
Will there be drop in advising tomorrow?(May 18)
Oh, you may have taken that in an earlier semester
I have received all the grades for the courses for declaring a CS major. When will the application be processed?

That's what we're going to be doing in the next few weeks. How fast we can complete the process will depend on things like when the grades for your classes come in (some of them aren't available yet) and how many of you have applied this semester. We also need to graduate all of the Spring 2022 CS majors, and the CS, EECS, and EIS minors. So we can't give you an exact date.

i've been waiting for more than a week to get my application signed... should i bump my email again? 

also, is this the right email: cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu
Yes, please! Sorry about that. Yes, that's the correct email.
usually how long will it take to get a cs advisor to sign a double major application via email?

history.content:
Dear Students,

We hope that you have recovered from finals week and are enjoying a well-deserved break!
In order to work on internal projects like processing major applications, graduating all of the CS majors and minors and holding Golden Bear Advising for new students, CS and EECS advising appointments & drop in will be unavailable starting May 23rd through June 17th. Appointments will resume starting June 21st. We plan to expand drop-in hours and will have more information about that soon. 
We will continue to be available via email, cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu and eecs-advising@eecs.berkeley.edu. Please give us a few days to respond, but we'll try to get back to you as soon as possible.
Sending warm regards for summer,
The CS and EECS Advising Teams
#pin
history.subject: CS and EECS advising appointments & drop-in closed, 5/23-6/17
